explains: n. （尤指艺术的）现代主义者

sentences.en: He's connected to both those strains as well as the modernist strain.
sentences.cn: 他与这两种风格和现代主义风格都有联系。

sentences.en: It was a modernist triumph, and many elements remain central features of today's kitchen.
sentences.cn: 这是一个现代主义的胜利，许多元素仍然是当今厨房的核心特征。

sentences.en: The modernist composition of the park was designed by Stanislav Gralla.
sentences.cn: 公园的现代主义构图是由斯坦尼斯拉夫·格拉拉设计的。
